summary: REQ-1 appears implemented by constraining the Zone dropdown list height and enabling vertical scrolling via Tailwind classes on `SelectContent` in `DiscoverFilters.tsx`. No evidence of backend changes or edits under `frontend/src/components/ui` in the provided diff summary. Two additional non-requested metadata/state files were modified.

hallucinated_features.description: Modified repository metadata/documentation summary file (`frontend-file-summaries.txt`) unrelated to making the Zone dropdown scrollable.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asks for a UI behavior change in `frontend/src/components/DiscoverFilters.tsx`; updating a file summary document is not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated `project_state.json` (feature request tracking/status) unrelated to implementing the UI scroll behavior.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not ask to change project tracking/state files; it requests only the UI fix.
